text: is a public park located in Ota ward, Tokyo, Japan. Tamagawadai Park Ota Ward Retrieved April 24, 2017 It contains two ancient kofun burial mounds. Tamagawadai park Retrieved April 24, 2017 It contains a number of cherry blossom trees and is also well known for its large number of hydrangea trees. ==References== Category:Parks and gardens in Tokyo Category:Hanami spots of Japan
title: Tamagawadai Park
